testcase.name: Register a user with Valid email address
testcase.system-out: Given user opens the "chrome" browser.......................................passed Given user enters the url "http://automationpractice.com/index.php".........passed Given user is on the application login page.................................passed And user clicks on Sign in link.............................................passed And user enters an email address as "TestKSamy@gmail.com"...................passed And user clicks on Create an account button.................................passed And user selects title as Mr................................................passed And user enters Customer FirstName as "Amit"................................passed And user enters Customer LastName as "Patil"................................passed And user enters Password as "windows@123"...................................passed And user enters Company as "Yahoo"..........................................passed And user enters Address as "First Lane Narhe"...............................passed And user enters City as "Romulus"...........................................passed And user selects State as "Alabama".........................................passed And user enters ZipCode as "35006"..........................................passed And user selects Country as "United States".................................passed And user enters Mobile as "9898989898"......................................passed And user enters AliasAddress as "Test Address"..............................passed And user clicks on Register button..........................................passed Then user lands on the MyAccount page.......................................passed
